interactives.name: snarling dog
interactives.description: This dog seems to be chewing on a colorful beach ball. Perhaps you could distract it...

interactives.name: crying child
interactives.description: The crying child says, "I've lost my favorite beach ball. WAHHHHHH"

items.name: dog bone
items.description: A bone that could please or distract a dog.
